REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2834 reute d f BC-NORTECK-<NTK>-UNIT-PO 10-20 0065

TEXT.TITLE: NORTECK <NTK> UNIT POSTPONES INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Nortek Inc said its Dixieline Products Inc subsidiary has postponed its planned initial offering of 1.6 mln shares of class A common stock Nortek cited adverse and volatile market conditions as the reason for the decision. Nortek said it may reconsider the offering when faovrable market conditions return. Reuter
